price: 26. Toen greep Ik degenen die ongelovig was en hoe vreselijk was dan Mijn afkeuring?
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
